mapper.select: select * from (select @RN:=@RN+1 as rnum, a.* from (select c.*,r.r_name,s.sf_name,ct.ct_name from course_t c,room_t r,staff_t s,course_type_t ct WHERE c_status = 0 and c.ct_idx= ct.ct_idx and c.r_idx=r.r_idx and s.sf_idx = c.sf_idx)a ,(select @RN:=0) b) c where c.rnum between ${begin} and ${end} ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_t(c_name,start_date,end_date,course_fee,c_peo_num, c_round_num, c_status, ct_idx, t_idx) values(#{c_name}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{course_fee}, #{c_peo_num}, #{c_round_num}, 0, #{ct_idx}, #{t_idx})
